name: Pixel Sword Fish io
summary:
Swim and kill your opponents! Using a swordfish tusk as a sword and stabbing other swordfish. Can you became the strongest player of the arena? 
This fierce multiplayer game pits you against other angry, deadly creatures. You’ll never get the chance to sit still with over 30 other players launching themselves.

Your goal is to become a creature with the biggest sword in the world. If you touch with your sword another players, they will explode and you will get stars. But if other players run into YOU, then you will explode and it's a game over.

HOW TO PLAY:
Control your direction with joystick.
Use the boost button (the lower right corner of the screen) to make you slide faster. Running fast will reduce your boost energy but after 2 sec it will refill. 
Kill enemies to rise your sword and collect stars. Pop the balloons to get more stars. Get characters with stronger swords in a shop.

So, what are you waiting for?
Develop your battle skills and try to survive.

*Attention this app requires good internet connection!
